name: Hollow Joe has been defeated
description:
Hollow Joe has been defeated

***

English

Hollow Joe has terrorized us for years, but that might be over. Your sister was truly a hero. Are you?

***

Castellano

Joe el Hueco nos aterrorizó por años, pero eso podría estar llegando a su fin. Tu hermana era una verdadera heroína. ¿Y vos?
